page.title: 17DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content:
When it's not school I get up at half nine, but some times I get up at eight because I go with my brother on his{paper-round.}We take our dog aswell. When we get back I have something to eat like{toast}or {Weetobix,}when everyone in my family has had somthing to eat, some one gets the pots to wash up. When everything is clean I go out to play or go shopping with my mum.
When we get our shopping done we go home and then I play out. On a hot day and it there's nothing to do I play on my{roller-boots.}On Sunday we have a big dinner and then we clean up again. I go and play out again for an hour or till its time for tea. In the evening I like to watch{television.
